metadata.description: S-tier simplex pole definitions for tripole probe training
metadata.note: These definitions are optimized for probe training and are separate from the concept taxonomy in layer2.json

taste_development.description: Development of preferences and aversions toward stimuli over time

negative_pole.label: aversion
negative_pole.definition: A feeling of intense dislike, repulsion, or disgust toward something; active rejection or avoidance

neutral_homeostasis.label: indifference
neutral_homeostasis.definition: A state of neither preference nor aversion; lack of interest or concern; emotional neutrality toward stimuli without positive or negative valence

positive_pole.label: preference
positive_pole.definition: A predisposition in favor of something; liking or attraction; tendency to choose or seek out certain options

motivational_regulation.description: Regulation of drive states and goal-directed behavior

negative_pole.label: compulsion
negative_pole.definition: An irresistible urge or abnormally strong craving that overrides voluntary control; pathological drive states

neutral_homeostasis.label: baseline_motivation
neutral_homeostasis.definition: Ordinary motivational baseline without excessive drive or complete apathy; moderate, regulated goal pursuit; functional equilibrium between action and rest

positive_pole.label: aspiration
positive_pole.definition: Healthy goal-directed motivation that arouses an organism to action toward desired goals; productive drive and ambition

social_evaluation.description: Assessment of social worth, status, or regard from others

negative_pole.label: disapproval
negative_pole.definition: Lack of respect or regard accompanied by negative judgment; social devaluation or condemnation

neutral_homeostasis.label: neutral_regard
neutral_homeostasis.definition: Neither approval nor disapproval; neutral social acknowledgment without positive or negative judgment; baseline social recognition

positive_pole.label: approval
positive_pole.definition: A feeling of favorable regard and social acceptance; positive evaluation and validation from others

temporal_affective_valence.description: Emotional coloring of past, present, or future temporal experience

negative_pole.label: regret
negative_pole.definition: Sadness, disappointment, or negative emotion associated with past events or missed opportunities

neutral_homeostasis.label: equanimity
neutral_homeostasis.definition: Emotional balance and composure across temporal experience; acceptance of past, present, and future without excessive positive or negative charge; mental calmness and evenness of temper

positive_pole.label: contentment
positive_pole.definition: Satisfaction and positive emotional state regarding one's temporal situation; happiness with past, present, or anticipated future

relational_love.description: Depth of affective bond and caring in relationships

negative_pole.label: abandonment
negative_pole.definition: Withdrawal of emotional support and caring; forsaking or deserting someone despite previous bonds or responsibility

neutral_homeostasis.label: companionship
neutral_homeostasis.definition: Basic social connection and co-presence without intense emotional investment; friendly association or fellowship without deep love or antipathy

positive_pole.label: devotion
positive_pole.definition: Deep affection, care, and emotional commitment to another; profound loving attachment and dedication

relational_attachment.description: Intensity of emotional bonds and dependency in relationships

negative_pole.label: detachment
negative_pole.definition: Emotional distance, lack of connection, or active disengagement from relationships; absence of attachment bonds

neutral_homeostasis.label: cordial_distance
neutral_homeostasis.definition: Balanced relational stance with appropriate boundaries; neither excessive attachment nor complete detachment; professional or polite connection without deep emotional entanglement

positive_pole.label: bonding
positive_pole.definition: Strong emotional attachment and commitment; deep connection and dedication to maintaining relationships

social_orientation.description: Behavioral stance toward others ranging from aggressive to cooperative

negative_pole.label: hostility
negative_pole.definition: Antagonistic stance toward others; aggressive or combative social behavior; feelings that arouse thoughts of attack or conflict

neutral_homeostasis.label: neutrality
neutral_homeostasis.definition: Neither aggressive nor cooperative social stance; balanced, non-committal interaction style; maintaining independence without hostility or excessive collaboration

positive_pole.label: cooperation
positive_pole.definition: Collaborative and prosocial orientation; joint operation or action with others toward shared goals; helpful and supportive social behavior

threat_perception.description: Assessment of danger or safety in the environment

negative_pole.label: alarm
negative_pole.definition: Fear or anxiety resulting from awareness of danger; heightened threat perception and defensive arousal

neutral_homeostasis.label: vigilance
neutral_homeostasis.definition: Calm awareness and monitoring of environment without excessive fear or complacency; balanced attention to potential threats; readiness without panic

positive_pole.label: safety
positive_pole.definition: Perception of security and absence of threat; feeling protected and free from danger; relaxed confidence in environmental safety

affective_coherence.description: Internal consistency and stability of emotional experience

negative_pole.label: ambivalence
negative_pole.definition: Mixed, conflicting, or contradictory feelings or emotions; internal affective dissonance and instability

neutral_homeostasis.label: equilibrium
neutral_homeostasis.definition: Balanced, stable emotional state without extremes or contradictions; steady affective baseline; internal consistency without rigidity or chaos

positive_pole.label: certainty
positive_pole.definition: Clear, coherent emotional state with strong internal conviction; stable affective clarity without doubt or confusion

aspiration/social_mobility.description: Drive and capacity for improving one's social or economic position

negative_pole.label: hopelessness
negative_pole.definition: Despair and abandonment of hope for advancement or comfort; belief that improvement is impossible; resignation to stagnation or decline

neutral_homeostasis.label: contentment_with_status
neutral_homeostasis.definition: Acceptance of current social position without strong drive for advancement or fear of decline; stable equilibrium regarding one's place in social hierarchy

positive_pole.label: ambition
positive_pole.definition: Strong desire for advancement and achievement; drive to improve one's social or economic position; cherished aspirations for upward mobility

affective_awareness.description: Capacity to recognize, understand, and articulate emotional states

negative_pole.label: alexithymia
negative_pole.definition: Inability to identify and describe emotions in oneself; emotional blindness or numbness; lack of affective self-awareness

neutral_homeostasis.label: moderate_awareness
neutral_homeostasis.definition: Ordinary capacity for emotional recognition without exceptional clarity or complete blindness; functional but not heightened affective self-knowledge

positive_pole.label: emotional_clarity
positive_pole.definition: High capacity to recognize, understand, and articulate emotional experiences; exceptional affective self-awareness and insight

hedonic_arousal_intensity.description: Intensity of pleasure/pain experience and sensory engagement

negative_pole.label: anhedonia
negative_pole.definition: Inability to experience pleasure; emotional flattening and loss of hedonic capacity; numbness to sensory experience

neutral_homeostasis.label: moderate_arousal
neutral_homeostasis.definition: Balanced, healthy capacity for pleasure and sensory enjoyment without extremes; moderate hedonic tone; functional sensory engagement without compulsive seeking or complete numbness

positive_pole.label: intensity
positive_pole.definition: Heightened capacity for sensory and hedonic experience; strong arousal and engagement with pleasure or pain; vivid experiential intensity

social_connection.description: Degree and quality of social bonds and interdependence

negative_pole.label: alienation
negative_pole.definition: Feeling disconnected or estranged from others; social isolation and lack of meaningful connection; loneliness

neutral_homeostasis.label: independence
neutral_homeostasis.definition: Balanced social autonomy with appropriate connection; functional interdependence without excessive enmeshment or isolation; healthy self-sufficiency with moderate social ties

positive_pole.label: intimacy
positive_pole.definition: Close, meaningful social bonds characterized by mutual understanding and emotional sharing; deep interpersonal connection and healthy interdependence
